item.description:
As part of Free RPG Day Toys N Things will be hosting a Meetup for those players interested in other game systems besides D&D. The meetup starts at 2PM and we'll have free materials from various game publishers on hand for players to evaluate and take home. Those interested in seeing which manufacturers are taking part in Free RPG day can visit: http://www.freerpgday... for more information.

If there is enough interest we can run a quick pick up game using one of the various systems. Light refreshments will be served. Hope to see RPFGA members on the 19th!

Thanks

Evan J.
Toys N Things
item.name: Free RPG Day Meetup
